byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Both sides rept patrol activity as cold weather moderates
snippet: PARIS, Feb. 1--With the cold becoming less bitter on the RhineMoselle front, more activity is developing. The French in particular have been sending out scouting parties far into enemy lines to obtain information inaccessible to aerial observation...

headline.main: ACTIVITY INCREASES ON WESTERN FRONT; French Send Out Four Patrols as Cold Moderates

lead_paragraph: PARIS, Feb. 1--With the cold becoming less bitter on the RhineMoselle front, more activity is developing. The French in particular have been sending out scouting parties far into enemy lines to obtain information inaccessible to aerial observation.
